item.title: SCOOP: Newsom to ask world leaders to exempt California exports from retaliatory tariffs
item.description: Gov. Gavin Newsom plans to make an announcement Friday to counter President Donald Trump's tariff hikes, asking countries to exempt California exports...

item.title: One Republican senator voted against confirming Trump nominee Harmeet Dhillon
item.description: Sen. Lisa Murkowski was the only Republican senator to vote against confirming Trump nominee Harmeet Dhillon to serve as assistant attorney general.

item.title: Maryland bill creating commission to study, recommend slavery reparations heads to governor's desk
item.description: Maryland lawmakers have advanced a bill aimed at creating a commission to study and recommend potential slavery reparations to Gov. Wes Moore's desk.
